entry.title: Waterproof Foldable Car Trash Can With Lid and Storage Pockets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 33.95

Keep Your Car Clean

Stop junking up your car with empty water bottles, straw wrappers, fast food containers and juice boxes! Toss it all in this handy and stylish car trash bag!

✓ Waterproof & Leakproof: Car Garbage Can is constructed with durable vinyllining prevents spills and stains. You can use it as a Garbage Bin, an Organizer or even a thermo tank! You can even pour liquid such as leftover coffee into the trash Bag directly. In addition to this, you can also put ice cube in the car organizer to keep your drinks cool and enjoy your road trip!

✓ Multiple Storage Space Design: Garbage can has a lid to keep odors inside with a self-closing cover hole and the Velcro on the lid can helps it easily close tight and open. Besides, it has 2 mesh pocket in two sides and a front textile pocket. And you can put any items such as tissue or the toys. And the clips on the both sides can help you fix the garbage bag. 

✓ Large Capacity And Foldable: Foldable design of our car trash bin is smart for room-saving when you don’t use it. You can easily store it in your car's drawer and convenient to carry it when you go outdoor. A perfect gift for your trip! Adjustable buckle allows you to hang it anywhere.

Your Complete Satisfaction Is Our Top Priority

 

Specification:

✓ Material: Oxford cloth

✓ Color: Black

✓ Size: 16cm x 15cm x 25cm

✓ Weight: 325g

Package Included:

✓ Car Trash Can

entry.title: Car Trunk Storage Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 33.99

Car Trunk Organizer Black 3 Large Sections Of Storage

Need a storage solution to tame the mess in your vehicle? This collapsible Car Trunk Organizer is designed for modern life. With so much of our time spent on the road, we need storage for all those odds and ends.

Velcro Car Trunk Organizer A space for everything, this organizer has 4 internal dividers and pockets of varying sizes. See-through mesh side pockets let you quickly find what you need. When you don’t need it, collapse it in seconds and tuck it away.

Features:

- Collapsible: When not in use, simply fold flat and buckle the straps. 

- Various Uses: Use in your compact car, SUV, or truck. With multiple compartments, you have plenty of space to store whatever you need.

- Stain Repellant: The durable fabric resists stains, so your auto organizer stays clean even with kids in the car. Plus, the black material easily hides scuffs or wear and tear.

- 6 Pockets: The 4 mesh pockets are perfect for those items you need to grab in a hurry. The two larger side pockets have velcro flaps, so you can store personal items or things you don’t want on display.

- Car Trunk Grocery Organizer Manages the Mess.

- Easy Transfer With the carrying handles, you can quickly switch your organizer from one car to another. Have all your stuff in one place, no matter what car you’re taking.

Don’t waste time looking for your things. Store all your car essentials in this handy organizer, so your car stays neat and tidy.

Specifications:

- Material: Oxford cloth

- Color: Black

- Size: 53*38*36cm

Package Included:

1 x Car Trunk Storage Organizer

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 35.99

Convert your steering wheel into an ergonomic work surface that's great for writing, or to use while eating in the car. The lightweight construction makes it easy to carry with you or store in the back seat while not in use.

Turn Your Car Into An Office

and turns it into a desk that you can write on, put your laptop or iPad on.
It can easily hold a laptop.

Car Food Tray Table

Flip it over and it becomes a great tray table for eating a meal. It even has a slot for a drink.

No more awkwardly balancing the food wrappers on your lap and having the grease from your burger soak through to your clothes.

Makes it easy to eat and no more dripped ketchup or sauces on your clothes!

Adding A Desk To Your Car Is Easy

Just clip it to your steering wheel and the tray snugly fits most modern cars.

You'll love this! From watching a movie to kill time waiting on kids or are finishing up a weekly report for work, this awesome invention makes things easier.

Features and Benefits:

- Sturdy ABS Construction

- Easy To Clean

- Raised Front Edges on Tray Prevents Items From Sliding Off 

- Multiple Slots For Stuff Like Soda Cans, Cups, Pens, and more

- Non-Slip Surface

- Ergonomic Table

- Double-Sided Design (Portable Desk and Food Tray)

- Easy to Place and Remove On Your Steering Wheel

- Easy to Store

- Great for People Who Work In Their Car

- Overall Dimension: 16.5 inches x 11 inches

Package Included:

entry.title: Fast Car Charger Power Adapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 15.99

  • With a voltmeter: With a voltage detect function, not only the car charger available as, you can always clearly see the voltage situation of the car from the LED screen.
  • 2 port total 3.1A output: With Smart function, automatically detect connected device and offer the most suitable current to charge, When charging one terminal, current can reach up to 2A. When charging 2 terminals at the same time, current of 2 ports is total 3.1A. (Note: QC / PD quick charge is not supported.)
  • Safety protection: This voltmeter cigarette lighter can protect charge device from overcharge, over voltage, under voltage, short circuit, over current, overload, overheating by perfect safety system and can use safely safely.
  • Two USB port charge simultaneous: It carries two USB ports and can charge two terminals at the same time. Besides smartphones and tablets, it is possible to charge various devices such as power bank, game consoles and music players.
  • DC12-24V: Compatible with both 12V and 24V vehicles, it can be used for many types of vehicles. Power consumption: 15.5W.
